KitKat said no harm would come to Foxfingers and when she stopped 
Drillbit he was beginning to believe her. Usually when A predacon 
wants to sit and talk it's so reinforcements could arrive. He was 
outnumbered 2 to 1 and still standing. he walked over to where kitKat 
was and sat. "OK what would you like to talk about? I know how bout 
the sintronic cybers Cyberball team I think they could go all the way 
this year." he was being a smartalec but he had to try to keep them 
off gaurd as long as he could.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::KitKat::
> 
> She transformed back to bot and looked at FoxFingers. "Now, will 
you 
> quietly sit down here and talk? As I siad, I won't harm you."
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Foxfingers stopped in mid leap. This wasn't a cat he was looking 
at 
> > but a seemingly large and peturbed wolf. "OKAY theres no need to 
be 
> > hasty, I'm sorry about that over reaction." he didn't know what 
> else 
> > to do it was either beg for mercy or run like the devil himself 
was 
> > after him. Options were extremely limited right now, either run 
and 
> > risk the autoguns or try and talk his way out of trouble. He 
> > transformed back to bot and set his pistol down at his 
side. "Easy 
> > there, I'm sure we can come to some sort of arrangement."
> >
